title: Tax Code’s Race Bias Runs Deep
itunes:title: Tax Code’s Race Bias Runs Deep
description:
Dorothy Brown has spent her career as a law professor documenting racism in a tax system that’s supposedly colorblind. She found proof in years of data.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
